about_the_game:
Please join us on Discord for support, offer feedback and SFW / NSFW examples.


The Titanium Core Franchise DLC adds nearly 50 figurines across three collections:

  • Sci-Fi Brutes - Sci-Fi Monsters and more.
  • Observe Protect Conquer - Characters in Military and Battle Armor.
  • Interplanetary Workforce - Robots and more to staff a cruiser or planet terraforming project.

Add figurines to scenes and pose them using hundreds of humanoid and custom animations. Add dialogs, props and procedural realism effects to them and save as characters to your portfolio you can re-use. Produce the scene with different frames, LUTs, skyboxes and more. Record your creation with built-in high quality Mp4, Jpeg and Gif capture.

This DLC is part of the base game, install for free through the franchise settings menu in Figurine Scene Simulator.

Purchase the Titanium Core Franchise Premium Unlock to unlock additional variants and color customization options.

content_descriptors.notes:
Figurine Scene Simulator is meant to be a complete game which can be enjoyed without the use of NSFW type content. However, in addition to being able to exploit camera angles and animations/poses to create sexually suggestive images, there is also a considerable amount of NSFW costumes and nudity* at various levels across a number of the included and expansion figurines as well as some explicit animations.  This content will grow during development.

(*These are enabled in-game by engaging the NSFW/NSFUA Content checkbox)

In addition to horror/gory figurines and scenes, additional fx will be added to allow for extremely violent/gory scenes.

Note: All Characters are 18 or older.

name: Figurine Scene Simulator: Titanium Core Franchise

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7-6700
  • Graphics: AMD R9 380
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7-6700
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 6GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: The Titanium Core Franchise DLC adds nearly 50 figurines across three collections.
